p: For most general experimental techniques and procedures, see reference [ 80]; 1H NMR and 13C NMR chemical shifts are relative to signals of residual C HD 2OD and 12 CD 3OD in MeOH- d 4 (δ H 3.27 (central line of a quintuplet) and δ C 49.0 (central line of a septuplet), respectively). Preparative medium-pressure liquid chromatographic (MPLC) separations were carried out on a Biotage Isolera instrument.
